content: Analyze all raw commit data files to identify missing contributions for Terry Li and Chen Li
Execute user_summary_generator.py to regenerate complete user summaries including all discovered commit data
Verify Terry Li's 476 commits from data-source-manager are included in regenerated summaries
Verify Chen Li's additional commits from main ml-feature-set repository are consolidated
Regenerate team analytics with complete contribution data from all repositories
Review final user summaries to ensure accurate commit counts and comprehensive cross-repository portfolios
